remarks: Theorem ~ meredith restated as an axiom.  This will allow us to ensure that the rederivation of ~ ax1 , ~ ax2 , and ~ ax3 below depend only on Meredith's sole axiom and not accidentally on a previous theorem above. Outside of this section, we will not make use of this axiom.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2002.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: ax-meredith $p |- ( ( ( ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ( -. ch -> -. th ) ) -> ch ) -> ta ) -> ( ( ta -> ph ) -> ( th -> ph ) ) ) $.
